question: [Challenge] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (94, 142), (169, 169), (106, 137), (112, 142), (160, 132).

qas.question: [Challenge] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (94, 142), (169, 169), (106, 137), (112, 142), (160, 132).
[Challenge] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (94, 142), (169, 169), (106, 137), (112, 142), (160, 132). Respond only with the area.
[Challenge] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (94, 142), (169, 169), (106, 137), (112, 142), (160, 132). Respond only with the number of vertices.
